        content: url(https://98point6-marketing-assets.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/icons/relentless-improvement.jpg);
    }
    .icon-faq #shi:before {
        content: url(https://98point6-marketing-assets.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/icons/sustainable-high-intensity.jpg);
    }
    .icon-faq #ui:before {
        content: url(https://98point6-marketing-assets.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/icons/uncompromising-integrity.jpg);
    }
    .icon-faq #ut:before {
        content: url(https://98point6-marketing-assets.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/icons/unconstrained-thinking.jpg);
    }
    
    </style>
    <div class="block-bg-none block-container block-faq icon-faq block-index-7">
        <div class="two-col-text">
        <div>
            <div class="row block-faq__row">
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="bia" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0">Bias for Action</div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p>We operate with a sense of urgency, taking swift and decisive action when required. We are resourceful and adaptable, making things happen even in the face of ambiguity.</p></div>
                </div>
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="bt" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><p>Build Trust</p></div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p>We actively build positive working relationships by being transparent and keeping commitments, having the right conversations at the right time for the right reasons. We listen to each other and give and receive thoughtful feedback with open arms.</p></div>
                </div>
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="candc" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><p>Collaborate & Commit</p></div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p>We build collaboratively and respectfully. We embrace unique and diverse perspectives and regard everyone as an esteemed member of the team. We believe exponentially better outcomes are created when we work together.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="clv" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><p>Consider the Long View</p></div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p>We build for the future, prioritizing long-term value over short-term savings or gain.                                                                                                                           </p></div>
                </div>
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="courage" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><p>Courage</p></div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p>We are brave, have backbone and take smart risks. We aren't afraid to tackle the hard problems or to represent an unpopular view when we believe it's the right thing for the business and customer.</p></div>
                </div>
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="cit" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><p>Critical & Informed Thinking</p></div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p>We think about problems deeply, and learn quickly in order to resolve the essential issues that we face. We use informed perspectives to guide good judgement and continually gather information to understand.</p></div>
                </div>
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="dir" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><p>Deliver Impactful Results</p></div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p>Our success is defined by the quality, timeliness and value of the results we deliver. We prioritize work that makes a difference, understanding the purpose of our work and how it helps achieve our ultimate mission.</p></div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div>
            <div class="row block-faq__row">
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="innovation" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0">Innovation</div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p>We are creative and inventive, willing to seek the simplest approach to achieve success. We look for great ideas anywhere and everywhere.</p></div>
                </div>
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="ownership" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><p>Ownership</p></div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p>Nothing is above or below us and we do whatever it takes to get things done. We are accountable and take responsibility for our work.</p></div>
                </div>
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="pfews" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><p>Passion for Everyone We Serve</p></div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p>We make the lives of the people we serve better in a tangible way. We consider their needs in the decisions that we make, and prioritize initiatives that positively impact and delight them.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="ri" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><p>Relentless Improvement</p></div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p>We are tenacious about continual improvement in ourselves, our team, our product and our business. We audit frequently and believe there is always more to develop, learn, apply and share.</p></div>
                </div>
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="shi" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><p>Sustainable High Intensity</p></div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p style="width:100%;">We value intense and focused effort.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         </p></div>
                </div>
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="ui" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><p>Uncompromising Integrity</p></div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p>We hold ourselves to the highest ethical standards. As a company and as individuals, we share the responsibility for earning and building the loyalty and trust of everyone we serve.</p></div>
                </div>
                <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                    <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                        <div id="ut" class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><p>Unconstrained Thinking</p></div>
                        <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                    </div>              
                    <div class="block-faq__text"><p style="width:100%;">We tackle audacious problems by proceeding boldly, with open minds.                                                                                                                                                                                                </p></div>
                </div>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>		</div>
	</div>
</div>
	</section>

<p><span class="subtitle"><strong>We’ve been alerted that scammers will sometimes impersonate our employees and make fictitious job offers.</strong></span> The only official email address domain used by 98point6 is “@98point6.com,” and we are only recruiting for the positions listed below. If you have been contacted by any other email domain, offered a position that’s not on our website, or received any other suspicious communication, please do not engage, mark the email as phishing and file a report at <a class="link-text" href="https://reportfraud.ftc.gov/">https://reportfraud.ftc.gov/</a>.</p>

# [98point6 Technologies on 2022-11-04](https://www.98point6.com/about-us/careers/)
We’ve been alerted that scammers will sometimes impersonate our employees and make fictitious job offers. The only official email address domain used by 98point6 is “@98point6.com,” and we are only recruiting for the positions listed below. Additionally, we will never ask you to send any payment to our company or employees, and all 98point6 equipment is provided at no charge to our employees. If you have been contacted by any other email domain, offered a position that’s not on our website, or received any other suspicious communication, please do not engage, mark the email as phishing and file a report at https://reportfraud.ftc.gov/.

<style>
   .acc-tabs * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.acc-tabs *:focus, .acc-tabs input:focus + label {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px #017681;
}

.acc-tabs {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin: 0 auto 20px;
  border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0;
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab {
  position: absolute;
  opacity: 0;
}

.acc-tabs .label {
  padding: 10px 8px;
  background: var(--primary-beige);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: 'Lora', serif;
line-height: 12px; font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--primary-text);
  transition: background .3s, color .3s;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 0;
  text-align: center;
  width: auto;
    flex-grow: 1;
    border-radius: 0;
    border-bottom: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
    margin-bottom:0;
}

.acc-tabs .label:hover {
  background: var(--neutral-light);
}

.acc-tabs .label:active {
  background: var(--neutral-light);  
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label {
  background: var(--neutral-light);
  color: var(--primary-text);
  border-top: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-left: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-right: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-bottom: none;
}

.acc-tabs .label .label-name {
   display: inline-block;
}

.acc-tabs .label .label-name:after {
    content: "";
    border-bottom: 2px solid var(--primary-medium);
    display: block;
    margin-top: 6px;
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label .label-name:after {
    content: "\2304";
    border-bottom: none;
    margin-top:-10px;
    color:var(--primary-medium);
}
/** these next three are required to overwrite existing label css **/
.acc-tabs input[type=radio] {
        display: block;
    }
.acc-tabs input[type=radio]+label::before {
    border:none;
}
.acc-tabs input[type=radio]+label::after, .acc-tabs input[type=radio]:checked+label::after {background:transparent;}

    .acc-tabs .panel {
    order: 99;
  }
.acc-tabs .panel {
  display: none;
  padding: 20px 30px 30px;
  background: var(--neutral-light);
  width: 100%;
  border-left: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-bottom: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-right: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
}
.acc-tabs .panel.padding-none {
    padding: 0;
}
.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label + .panel {
  display: block;
}
.mt-fullwidth-row {
    display: grid;
    background-color: transparent;
}
.mt-fullwidth-row.left-image {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
}

.mt-text {
    padding: 6% 7.68%;
}

.mt-image {
    background-position: center center;
    background-size: cover;
    min-height: 250px;
}

@media (min-width: 40.0625em) {
.mt-fullwidth-row.left-image {grid-template-columns: 33% 64%;}
.acc-tabs .label {padding: 22px 20px; line-height: 18px; font-size: 21px; }
}

				<div class="banner-default__content banner-default__content-two-column">					
						<h1 class="banner-default__title lora-large" style="text-align: left;">About 98point6 Technologies</h1>
						<div class="banner-default__subtitle p-large" style="text-align: left;">
							<p class="subtitle">The elevator pitch</p>
<p>Anyone at 98point6 will proudly tell you our platform is built by clinicians for clinicians. We’re attuned to the challenges health care organizations face, and every product conversation stems from how we can provide solutions. Not only do clinicians benefit from our platform; it also reduces admin work for the healthcare team and crafts a frictionless experience for patients.</p>
						</div>
				</div>
							</div>
		</div>

	</div>
<main class="main-content">
	<div class="tmpl-page">
			<section data-block-index="1" class="block-options-padding-remove-bottom block-bg-none block-container block-columns block-index-1" aria-label="Columns">
			<div class="block-inner num-col-1 ">
		<div class="row align-center">
							<div class="columns small-12 medium-12 large-12 col-content wysiwyg">
					<h3>Yes, we used to be affiliated with a virtual clinic …</h3>
<p>Before the days when video calls and remote meetings were ubiquitous, our team of healthcare experts knew there was a need to expand access to quality care beyond physical spaces. In 2017, 98point6 launched technology that created a 24/7 virtual clinic with on-demand, text-based primary care. Over the years, we refined the platform to:</p>
<ul class="list-bullets">
<li>Integrate with electronic health records</li>
<li>Provide clinical documentation and decision-support tools</li>
<li>Improve provider efficiency</li>
</ul>
<h3>… and now our software is changing healthcare tech.</h3>
<p>98point6 is no longer affiliated with a virtual clinic, and in 2023, we evolved to focus our business on building and licensing technology to healthcare organizations. In short, we’ve made it even easier for customers to leverage our learnings and experience for their virtual care needs.</p>
<h3>The fine print</h3>
<p>In spring 2023, Transcarent acquired the 98point6 healthcare delivery division and we reincorporated as 98point6 Technologies — evolving our mission by licensing our technology to healthcare organizations to expand access to care, improve patient engagement, and achieve cost savings. We acquired Bright.md in 2024, which is accelerating that expansion.</p>
				</div>
						</div>

# [98point6 Technologies on 2023-12-19](https://www.98point6.com/about-us/)
Yes, we used to be affiliated with a virtual clinic …

Before the days when video calls and remote meetings were ubiquitous, our team of healthcare experts knew there was a need to expand access to quality care beyond physical spaces. In 2017, 98point6 launched technology that created a 24/7 virtual clinic with on-demand, text-based primary care. Over the years, we refined the platform to:

Integrate with electronic health records

Provide clinical documentation and decision-support tools

Improve provider efficiency

… and now our software is changing healthcare tech.

98point6 is no longer affiliated with a virtual clinic, and in 2023, we evolved to focus our business on building and licensing technology to healthcare organizations. In short, we’ve made it even easier for customers to leverage our learnings and experience for their virtual care needs.

The fine print

In spring 2023, Transcarent acquired the 98point6 healthcare delivery division and we reincorporated as 98point6 Technologies — evolving our mission by licensing our technology to healthcare organizations to expand access to care, improve patient engagement, and achieve cost savings. We acquired Bright.md in 2024, which is accelerating that expansion.

Leveraging AI (before it was cool)

Since 2017, 98point6 has developed machine learning models that utilize insights from hundreds of thousands of patient visits and have been seamlessly deployed within our platform. This intelligence engine empowers our system to efficiently prioritize case assignments and equip clinical care teams with instant, one-click text-based options during patient interactions.

Because of our extensive history with AI, we have a vast data set that is one-of-a-kind in the field of natural language processing for medical applications — and these learnings are a key component to our software.

			<h3>Elevate the patient-provider relationship</h3>
<h5 style="text-align: left;">User-friendly and intuitive, ensuring a seamless care experience</h5>
<ul class="list-bullets">
<li>Give your patients the convenience of virtual care.</li>
<li>Make the patient log-in easy via SSO integration.</li>
<li>Make access as seamless as possible from all of your existing front doors (patient portal, app, website).</li>
<li>Encourage patient loyalty via a white-labeled and configurable experience that reflects your brand.</li>
</ul>

				<img alt="patient-intake" title="patient-intake" src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAGQAAAABCAQAAACC0sM2AAAADElEQVR42mNkGCYAAAGSAAIVQ4IOAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC" data-ib-sources="https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/03/10171629/patient-intake-226x300.png 226 300, https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/03/10171629/patient-intake-768x1020.png 768 1020, https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/03/10171629/patient-intake-771x1024.png 771 1024, https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/03/10171629/patient-intake-e1710091902255.png 527 700" data-ib-match-dpr="0" />			</div>

					</div>
		<div class="columns small-12 medium-8 large-8 col-option-left-small wysiwyg block-media-content__col-content">
			<h3>AI-powered patient intake</h3>
<h5 style="text-align: left;">Informed by AI and machine learning, reducing the administrative burden on clinicians</h5>
<ul class="list-bullets">
<li>The patient begins by entering the reason for their visit, and adding photos if needed.</li>
<li>To reduce the administrative burden on clinicians, 98point6 leverages machine learning and AI, informed by millions of patient encounters, to predict appropriate, information-gathering questions, just like a medical assistant might ask.</li>
<li>Async encounters are customizable to the specific workflow of the provider, with escalations directing the patient to real-time care, or prompting them to seek in-person care if their medical concern cannot be treated asynchronously.</li>
</ul>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

				<img alt="waitingroom" title="waitingroom" src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAGQAAAABCAQAAACC0sM2AAAADElEQVR42mNkGCYAAAGSAAIVQ4IOAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC" data-ib-sources="https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/03/13223948/waitingroom-300x199.jpg 300 199, https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/03/13223948/waitingroom-768x509.jpg 768 509, https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/03/13223948/waitingroom-1024x678.jpg 1024 678, https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/03/13223948/waitingroom.jpg 1398 926" data-ib-match-dpr="0" />			</div>

					</div>
		<div class="columns small-12 medium-6 large-6 col-option-right-medium wysiwyg medium-order-1 large-order-1 block-media-content__col-content">
			<h3>Easy-to-manage patient queue</h3>
<h5 style="text-align: left;">Quickly identify urgent concerns and patients waiting for care</h5>
<ul class="list-bullets">
<li>When a clinician logs onto the system, they can see the queue of patient visits, with each row displaying the patient name, chief concern, location, medical record number, age, gender, and their wait time.</li>
<li>Configurable to the unique provider’s workflow, patient visits can be self-assigned or assigned by an administrator.</li>
</ul>

</div>

		<div class="columns small-12 medium-6 large-6 col-option-left-medium block-media-content__col-media">
						<div class="block-media-content__media-container block-media-content__media-type--image-container ">
				<img alt="charting" title="charting" src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAGQAAAABCAQAAACC0sM2AAAADElEQVR42mNkGCYAAAGSAAIVQ4IOAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC" data-ib-sources="https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/03/13224002/charting-300x199.jpg 300 199, https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/03/13224002/charting-768x509.jpg 768 509, https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/03/13224002/charting-1024x678.jpg 1024 678, https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/03/13224002/charting.jpg 1398 926" data-ib-match-dpr="0" />			</div>

					</div>
		<div class="columns small-12 medium-6 large-6 col-option-left-medium wysiwyg block-media-content__col-content">
			<h3>Reduced charting time</h3>
<h5 style="text-align: left;">Automation, with complete control</h5>
<ul class="list-bullets">
<li>Patient data can be automatically pulled in from the EMR and incorporated into the patient encounter.</li>
<li>Medical charting encompasses demographics, patient flags, medical history, medication reconciliation, virtual encounter history, and the patient’s reported symptoms.</li>
<li>Once the clinician makes a diagnosis, documentation of differentials, prescriptions, and care plans are quick and efficient with built-in tools to support the clinician.</li>
<li>The medical professional is always in control and can choose what they use for assisted support.</li>
<li>Once the visit is complete, patient data is sent to the EMR, and the patient receives their care plan.</li>
</ul>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
	</section>
		<section data-block-index="20" class="block-bg-none block-container block-faq block-index-20" aria-label="Faq">
		
<div class="block-inner">
    <div class="row block-faq__row" id="faqs">
        <div class="columns small-12">
            <div class="block-faq__heading"><h2>FAQs</h2>
</div>
        </div>
                    <div class="block-faq__section columns small-12 subheading-collapse-" id="">
                <div class="section-subheading">
                    <div class="subheading"></div>
                </div>
                                    <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                        <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                            <div class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><h5>What is asynchronous care?</h5>
</div>
                            <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                        </div>              
                        <div class="block-faq__text"><p>Asynchronous care, or “async,” is a type of virtual care with no scheduling requirements, giving the patient the flexibility and convenience to seek care for non-urgent concerns whenever and wherever they’d like. Whereas a response from a provider may occur quickly, there is no real-time interaction between the patient and the medical staff. This type of dedicated care also helps with capturing revenue by incorporating patient messages from a provider’s inbox back into the patient chart to enhance the continuity of care. 98point6 can support your clinicians in asynchronously diagnosing and treating more than 140 common conditions for patients across all ages—from pediatrics to geriatrics.</p>
</div>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                        <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                            <div class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><h5>How do you guide the patient to the available care?</h5>
</div>
                            <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                        </div>              
                        <div class="block-faq__text"><p>Our AI-powered solution leverages evidence-based clinical content, machine learning, and automation to recommend the optimal care option, while also giving patients the ability to choose the format they prefer. Customizable to the specific workflow of the healthcare organization, the clinician can direct the patient to real-time care or prompt them to seek in-person care if their medical concern cannot be treated asynchronously.</p>
</div>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                        <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                            <div class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><h5>What does real-time virtual care look like?</h5>
</div>
                            <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                        </div>              
                        <div class="block-faq__text"><p>Real-time virtual care can consist of text-based messaging, audio, or video interactions, or any combination of the three. Additionally, real-time care can be facilitated as an on-demand or scheduled visit. On-demand visits allow patients to immediately start a visit, any time, from anywhere. Patients can report symptoms and concerns and our product gathers relevant history, before connecting the patient to a clinician. Wait times in the queue are dependent on clinician availability. Scheduled visits allow patients to choose a date and time in the future that is most convenient for them.</p>
</div>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                        <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                            <div class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><h5>How does the 98point6 automated patient intake work?</h5>
</div>
                            <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                        </div>              
                        <div class="block-faq__text"><p>Our patient intake automates much of the administrative tasks associated with taking a history. Our product is trained, based on millions of patient encounters, to respond to patient-reported symptoms with question sets, written by physicians, that elicit relevant clinical details for provider review. It works like this: the patient enters their chief complaint as free text. They can write as much or as little as they want to communicate the reason for their visit and their symptoms. The 98point6 platform intakes all of that information and then generates the appropriate follow-up questions.</p>
<p>Our patient intake process significantly reduces the administrative burden on clinicians – and automatically captures an accurate transcript of patient-reported symptoms.</p>
</div>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                        <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                            <div class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><h5>How does 98point6 use AI and machine learning?</h5>
</div>
                            <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                        </div>              
                        <div class="block-faq__text"><p>We have been applying artificial intelligence and machine learning to medical encounters since 2015. As a result, we have a vast data set that is one-of-a-kind in the field of natural language processing for medical applications. We utilize Al and machine learning to improve both efficiency and medical quality by automating time-consuming tasks, allowing clinicians to focus their judgment on key decision points in the clinical encounter. Our system provides information and actions for the clinician to consider; however, the clinician is in complete control of the visit diagnosis, and care planning.</p>
</div>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                        <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                            <div class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><h5>What kind of data integrations are included in the platform?</h5>
</div>
                            <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                        </div>              
                        <div class="block-faq__text"><p>Data integration is cornerstone to the 98point6 platform. EMR data can be automatically pulled into the clinician console, and once the visit is complete, data is automatically sent to the EMR to be recorded in the patient’s medical record. Our standards-based integration supports Epic and Cerner, as well as other EMRs. The platform also supports data integrations for analytics, reporting, security and compliance and other administrative needs.</p>
</div>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="block-faq__accordion-item">
                        <div class="block-faq__title_container">
                            <div class="block-faq__title" tabindex="0"><h5>Can we keep our branding?</h5>
</div>
                            <div class="block-faq__toggle"></div>
                        </div>              
                        <div class="block-faq__text"><p>98point6 is white-labeled and configurable to reflect your brand, offering a cohesive patient experience that promotes loyalty to your healthcare organization. It is designed to be exceptionally easy to onboard patients with an intuitive and responsive layout available on any device.</p>
</div>
                    </div>
                  
            </div>
          
    </div>
</div>	</section>
		<section data-block-index="21" class="maxwidth-highlight vertical-center bg-white-cream block-container block-columns block-index-21" aria-label="Columns">

# [98point6 Technologies on 2024-03-08](https://www.98point6.com/platform/)
Asynchronous care, or “async,” is a type of virtual care with no scheduling requirements, giving the patient the flexibility and convenience to seek care for non-urgent concerns whenever and wherever they’d like. Whereas a response from a provider may occur quickly, there is no real-time interaction between the patient and the medical staff. This type of dedicated care also helps with capturing revenue by incorporating patient messages from a provider’s inbox back into the patient chart to enhance the continuity of care. 98point6 can support your clinicians in asynchronously diagnosing and treating more than 140 common conditions for patients across all ages—from pediatrics to geriatrics.

Our AI-powered solution leverages evidence-based clinical content, machine learning, and automation to recommend the optimal care option, while also giving patients the ability to choose the format they prefer. Customizable to the specific workflow of the healthcare organization, the clinician can direct the patient to real-time care or prompt them to seek in-person care if their medical concern cannot be treated asynchronously.

Real-time virtual care can consist of text-based messaging, audio, or video interactions, or any combination of the three. Additionally, real-time care can be facilitated as an on-demand or scheduled visit. On-demand visits allow patients to immediately start a visit, any time, from anywhere. Patients can report symptoms and concerns and our product gathers relevant history, before connecting the patient to a clinician. Wait times in the queue are dependent on clinician availability. Scheduled visits allow patients to choose a date and time in the future that is most convenient for them.

Our patient intake automates much of the administrative tasks associated with taking a history. Our product is trained, based on millions of patient encounters, to respond to patient-reported symptoms with question sets, written by physicians, that elicit relevant clinical details for provider review. It works like this: the patient enters their chief complaint as free text. They can write as much or as little as they want to communicate the reason for their visit and their symptoms. The 98point6 platform intakes all of that information and then generates the appropriate follow-up questions.

Our patient intake process significantly reduces the administrative burden on clinicians – and automatically captures an accurate transcript of patient-reported symptoms.

We have been applying artificial intelligence and machine learning to medical encounters since 2015. As a result, we have a vast data set that is one-of-a-kind in the field of natural language processing for medical applications. We utilize Al and machine learning to improve both efficiency and medical quality by automating time-consuming tasks, allowing clinicians to focus their judgment on key decision points in the clinical encounter. Our system provides information and actions for the clinician to consider; however, the clinician is in complete control of the visit diagnosis, and care planning.

Data integration is cornerstone to the 98point6 platform. EMR data can be automatically pulled into the clinician console, and once the visit is complete, data is automatically sent to the EMR to be recorded in the patient’s medical record. Our standards-based integration supports Epic and Cerner, as well as other EMRs. The platform also supports data integrations for analytics, reporting, security and compliance and other administrative needs.

<style>
   .acc-tabs * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.acc-tabs *:focus, .acc-tabs input:focus + label {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px #017681;
}

.acc-tabs {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin: 0 auto 20px;
  border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0;
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab {
  position: absolute;
  opacity: 0;
}

.acc-tabs .label {
  padding: 10px 8px;
  background: var(--primary-beige);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: 'Lora', serif;
line-height: 12px; font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--primary-text);
  transition: background .3s, color .3s;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 0;
  text-align: center;
  width: auto;
    flex-grow: 1;
    border-radius: 0;
    border-bottom: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
    margin-bottom:0;
}

.acc-tabs .label:hover {
  background: var(--neutral-light);
}

.acc-tabs .label:active {
  background: var(--neutral-light);  
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label {
  background: var(--neutral-light);
  color: var(--primary-text);
  border-top: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-left: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-right: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-bottom: none;
}

.acc-tabs .label .label-name {
   display: inline-block;
}

.acc-tabs .label .label-name:after {
    content: "";
    border-bottom: 2px solid var(--primary-medium);
    display: block;
    margin-top: 6px;
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label .label-name:after {
    content: "\2304";
    border-bottom: none;
    margin-top:-10px;
    color:var(--primary-medium);
}
/** these next three are required to overwrite existing label css **/
.acc-tabs input[type=radio] {
        display: block;
    }
.acc-tabs input[type=radio]+label::before {
    border:none;
}
.acc-tabs input[type=radio]+label::after, .acc-tabs input[type=radio]:checked+label::after {background:transparent;}

    .acc-tabs .panel {
    order: 99;
  }
.acc-tabs .panel {
  display: none;
  padding: 20px 30px 30px;
  background: var(--neutral-light);
  width: 100%;
  border-left: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-bottom: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-right: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
}
.acc-tabs .panel.padding-none {
    padding: 0;
}
.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label + .panel {
  display: block;
}
.mt-fullwidth-row {
    display: grid;
    background-color: transparent;
}
.mt-fullwidth-row.left-image {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
}

.mt-text {
    padding: 6% 7.68%;
}

.mt-image {
    background-position: center center;
    background-size: cover;
    min-height: 250px;
}

@media (min-width: 40.0625em) {
.mt-fullwidth-row.left-image {grid-template-columns: 33% 64%;}
.acc-tabs .label {padding: 22px 20px; line-height: 18px; font-size: 21px; }

# [98point6 Virtual Care Platform for async and real on 2024-02-06](https://www.98point6.com/)
Frictionless virtual care

Imagine automating information gathered from the time the patient walks in the door to the moment they meet the clinician.

If you think that’s efficient, imagine how streamlined patient care is with decision-support tools.

Now picture that all happening alongside a real-time conversation with the patient via text-based messaging, audio or video. Oh, and did we mention that it’s turn-key and white labeled?

That’s the 98point6 difference.

<style>
   .acc-tabs * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.acc-tabs *:focus, .acc-tabs input:focus + label {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px #017681;
}

.acc-tabs {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin: 0 auto 20px;
  border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0;
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab {
  position: absolute;
  opacity: 0;
}

.acc-tabs .label {
  padding: 10px 8px;
  background: var(--primary-beige);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: 'Lora', serif;
line-height: 12px; font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--primary-text);
  transition: background .3s, color .3s;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 0;
  text-align: center;
  width: auto;
    flex-grow: 1;
    border-radius: 0;
    border-bottom: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
    margin-bottom:0;
}

.acc-tabs .label:hover {
  background: var(--neutral-light);
}

.acc-tabs .label:active {
  background: var(--neutral-light);  
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label {
  background: var(--neutral-light);
  color: var(--primary-text);
  border-top: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-left: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-right: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-bottom: none;
}

.acc-tabs .label .label-name {
   display: inline-block;
}

.acc-tabs .label .label-name:after {
    content: "";
    border-bottom: 2px solid var(--primary-medium);
    display: block;
    margin-top: 6px;
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label .label-name:after {
    content: "\2304";
    border-bottom: none;
    margin-top:-10px;
    color:var(--primary-medium);
}
/** these next three are required to overwrite existing label css **/
.acc-tabs input[type=radio] {
        display: block;
    }
.acc-tabs input[type=radio]+label::before {
    border:none;
}
.acc-tabs input[type=radio]+label::after, .acc-tabs input[type=radio]:checked+label::after {background:transparent;}

    .acc-tabs .panel {
    order: 99;
  }
.acc-tabs .panel {
  display: none;
  padding: 20px 30px 30px;
  background: var(--neutral-light);
  width: 100%;
  border-left: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-bottom: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-right: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
}
.acc-tabs .panel.padding-none {
    padding: 0;
}
.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label + .panel {
  display: block;
}

    display: grid;
    background-color: transparent;
}

    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
}

}

<main class="main-content">
	<div class="tmpl-post-single single-post">
			<section data-block-index="1" class="bg-teal block-container block-columns block-index-1" aria-label="Columns">
			<div class="block-inner num-col-1 ">
		<div class="row align-center">
							<div class="columns small-12 medium-12 large-12 col-content wysiwyg">
					<h1>Three Takeaways from ViVE 2023</h1>
				</div>
						</div>
	</div>
		</section>
		<section data-block-index="2" class="block-bg-none block-container block-columns block-index-2" aria-label="Columns">
			<div class="block-inner num-col-1 ">
		<div class="row align-center">
							<div class="columns small-12 medium-12 large-12 col-content wysiwyg">
					<p class="overhead-line">A few weeks ago, I had the distinct honor to represent 98point6 Technologies at <a href="https://hlthinc.pixieset.com/vive2023/" class="link-text">ViVE 2023 in Nashville</a>. While I’ve been back on the road for about 18 months now, I still relish the time spent in-person with my colleagues more than ever. ViVE offers a unique opportunity to get a pulse on the market and learn more about the issues keeping health system executives up at night—and dominating their discussions in the boardroom.</p>
<p>It was an invaluable experience for 98point6 as we’ve evolved from virtual care provider to SaaS provider, licensing our care delivery technology to some of the most recognized brands in healthcare. In the last few weeks since ViVE, I’ve been mentally recapping what I learned, what I saw, who I met and a few thoughts keep coming up for me that I believe will define the future of the industry.</p>
<h2 class="h-small">1. Balancing personalized and standardized care</h2>
<p>In the <i>Digital-First: Live and Let Die</i> panel on how healthcare organizations are leveraging technology to align with strategic priorities and manage growing workforce shortages, <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ashis-barad-md-ba2a15100/?trk=public_profile_browsemap" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="link-text">Dr. Ashis Barad</a>, Chief Digital Officer of <a href="https://www.ahn.org/" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="link-text">Allegheny Health Network</a> in Pittsburgh discussed why it’s imperative for health systems to standardize digital processes and personalize content to individuals and clinicians.</p>
<p>In today’s highly-competitive, financially-constrained markets, however, he also cautioned the audience about pitting standardization against personalization, saying health systems must balance operational improvement with consumers’ evolving preferences for a more personalized experience.</p>
<p>Before our March <a href="/press_release/98point6-press-release_03062023/" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="link-text">divestiture of the 98point6 care delivery division</a> to Transcarent, our virtual clinic was able to do both: AI-supported intake and automated practice standards helped our providers standardize the care delivered across our clinic while also enabling efficiencies that freed up clinicians to personalize patient communications. While 98point6 Technologies no longer provides care directly, we’re still focused on building tools that enable healthcare organizations to operate their own virtual clinics, improve inefficiencies and meet patients’ increasing calls for care that fits seamlessly into their lives. By leveraging AI models and user-friendly technology we can support changing patient needs on the front-end while also pairing them with the right provider that will help resolve their issues in the most efficient and cost-effective manner.</p>
<p>As our offering continues to evolve, Dr. Barad’s words will serve as a reminder that as we work to optimize or automate pieces of the care journey, we must always ask, “Have we made this feel personal to the patient?”</p>
<h2 class="h-small">2. Using force multipliers boosts RODI</h2>
<p class="quote-text">“How are healthcare leaders considering leveraging generative AI?”</p>
<p class="quote-text">“Will ChatGPT have a role to play in health systems?”</p>
<p>These are some of the questions I had going into ViVE—and candidly, one of the most enjoyable moments I had at the conference was asking ChatGPT to come up with 10 names for a hypothetical virtual primary care service!</p>
<p>While the audience couldn’t come to an agreement on whether any of them would suffice for a real-life brand, panelists and attendees did agree that AI-presented an opportunity to make care delivery frictionless and convenient for consumers, while decreasing burnout among providers—an outcome that would be hugely beneficial to overall operations. </p>
<p>During the panel, <em>Bringing Together a Frictionless Care Community</em>, which explored the opportunity to unify digital healthcare capabilities and aggregate data for a harmonized patient journey, I appreciated the following assertion from <a href="https://blog.providence.org/" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="link-text">Providence</a> CIO and EVP of Real Estate Strategy & Operations <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/bj-moore-2430365/" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="link-text">B.J. Moore</a>: health system leaders must work with organizations that are force multipliers to help them do more with less.</p>
<p>As we continue to build out our product roadmap at 98point6 Technologies, this was a great reminder of how health systems are thinking about measuring value, including the return on digital investments (RODI), particularly amid current economic conditions.</p>
<h2 class="h-small">3. Changing ecosystem dynamics ahead</h2>
<p>In these volatile, inflationary times, I was curious to hear how health systems would talk about the current labor market and their relationships with employers.</p>
<p><a href="https://jobs.northwell.edu/?utm_source=linkedin&utm_campaign=null&utm_medium=mcloud-misctags&utm_term=8747_LinkedIn%202020%20Profile" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="link-text">Northwell Direct</a> CEO <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/nickstefanizzi/" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="link-text">Nick Stefanizzi</a> cautioned the audience during his panel, The Rising Cost of Employer-Sponsored Health, about avoiding “logo soup,” meaning working with so many point solutions that patient care is fragmented and the cognitive burden among providers increases.</p>
<p>Nick also touched on the opportunity for health systems, as large employers with considerable expertise themselves, to disintermediate payors and craft deeper, more direct relationships with large employers.</p>
<p>Fortunately, we’re already seeing health systems start to consolidate their virtual care offerings for employees, members, patients and consumers. Organizations are increasingly moving away from the myriad point solutions that were more commonplace pre-pandemic and toward care extenders like 98point6 that integrate with their existing brand and patient pathways.</p>
<p>After a few days at ViVE in Nashville, I left excited and reinvigorated for what’s to come in the rapidly changing world of digital healthcare, and more confident than ever that 98point6 Technologies can help meet the rising demand in the market for purpose-built solutions developed for and by providers.</p>
<p>Are you interested in discussing your organization’s hybrid care extension needs? <a href="/#scheduleademo" rel="noopener" target="_blank" class="link-text">Schedule a demo</a> with us today.</p>
				</div>
						</div>
	</div>
		</section>
		</div>
</main>

# [Three Takeaways from ViVE 2023 by Alexis Frank on 2023-05-17](https://www.98point6.com/three-takeaways-from-vive-2023/)
A few weeks ago, I had the distinct honor to represent 98point6 Technologies at ViVE 2023 in Nashville. While I’ve been back on the road for about 18 months now, I still relish the time spent in-person with my colleagues more than ever. ViVE offers a unique opportunity to get a pulse on the market and learn more about the issues keeping health system executives up at night—and dominating their discussions in the boardroom.

It was an invaluable experience for 98point6 as we’ve evolved from virtual care provider to SaaS provider, licensing our care delivery technology to some of the most recognized brands in healthcare. In the last few weeks since ViVE, I’ve been mentally recapping what I learned, what I saw, who I met and a few thoughts keep coming up for me that I believe will define the future of the industry.

1. Balancing personalized and standardized care

In the Digital-First: Live and Let Die panel on how healthcare organizations are leveraging technology to align with strategic priorities and manage growing workforce shortages, Dr. Ashis Barad, Chief Digital Officer of Allegheny Health Network in Pittsburgh discussed why it’s imperative for health systems to standardize digital processes and personalize content to individuals and clinicians.

In today’s highly-competitive, financially-constrained markets, however, he also cautioned the audience about pitting standardization against personalization, saying health systems must balance operational improvement with consumers’ evolving preferences for a more personalized experience.

Before our March divestiture of the 98point6 care delivery division to Transcarent, our virtual clinic was able to do both: AI-supported intake and automated practice standards helped our providers standardize the care delivered across our clinic while also enabling efficiencies that freed up clinicians to personalize patient communications. While 98point6 Technologies no longer provides care directly, we’re still focused on building tools that enable healthcare organizations to operate their own virtual clinics, improve inefficiencies and meet patients’ increasing calls for care that fits seamlessly into their lives. By leveraging AI models and user-friendly technology we can support changing patient needs on the front-end while also pairing them with the right provider that will help resolve their issues in the most efficient and cost-effective manner.

As our offering continues to evolve, Dr. Barad’s words will serve as a reminder that as we work to optimize or automate pieces of the care journey, we must always ask, “Have we made this feel personal to the patient?”

2. Using force multipliers boosts RODI

“How are healthcare leaders considering leveraging generative AI?”

“Will ChatGPT have a role to play in health systems?”

These are some of the questions I had going into ViVE—and candidly, one of the most enjoyable moments I had at the conference was asking ChatGPT to come up with 10 names for a hypothetical virtual primary care service!

While the audience couldn’t come to an agreement on whether any of them would suffice for a real-life brand, panelists and attendees did agree that AI-presented an opportunity to make care delivery frictionless and convenient for consumers, while decreasing burnout among providers—an outcome that would be hugely beneficial to overall operations.

During the panel, Bringing Together a Frictionless Care Community, which explored the opportunity to unify digital healthcare capabilities and aggregate data for a harmonized patient journey, I appreciated the following assertion from Providence CIO and EVP of Real Estate Strategy & Operations B.J. Moore: health system leaders must work with organizations that are force multipliers to help them do more with less.

As we continue to build out our product roadmap at 98point6 Technologies, this was a great reminder of how health systems are thinking about measuring value, including the return on digital investments (RODI), particularly amid current economic conditions.

3. Changing ecosystem dynamics ahead

In these volatile, inflationary times, I was curious to hear how health systems would talk about the current labor market and their relationships with employers.

Northwell Direct CEO Nick Stefanizzi cautioned the audience during his panel, The Rising Cost of Employer-Sponsored Health, about avoiding “logo soup,” meaning working with so many point solutions that patient care is fragmented and the cognitive burden among providers increases.

Nick also touched on the opportunity for health systems, as large employers with considerable expertise themselves, to disintermediate payors and craft deeper, more direct relationships with large employers.

Fortunately, we’re already seeing health systems start to consolidate their virtual care offerings for employees, members, patients and consumers. Organizations are increasingly moving away from the myriad point solutions that were more commonplace pre-pandemic and toward care extenders like 98point6 that integrate with their existing brand and patient pathways.

After a few days at ViVE in Nashville, I left excited and reinvigorated for what’s to come in the rapidly changing world of digital healthcare, and more confident than ever that 98point6 Technologies can help meet the rising demand in the market for purpose-built solutions developed for and by providers.

<style>
   .acc-tabs * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.acc-tabs *:focus, .acc-tabs input:focus + label {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px #017681;
}

.acc-tabs {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin: 0 auto 20px;
  border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0;
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab {
  position: absolute;
  opacity: 0;
}

.acc-tabs .label {
  padding: 10px 8px;
  background: var(--primary-beige);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: 'Lora', serif;
line-height: 12px; font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--primary-text);
  transition: background .3s, color .3s;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 0;
  text-align: center;
  width: auto;
    flex-grow: 1;
    border-radius: 0;
    border-bottom: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
    margin-bottom:0;
}

.acc-tabs .label:hover {
  background: var(--neutral-light);
}

.acc-tabs .label:active {
  background: var(--neutral-light);  
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label {
  background: var(--neutral-light);
  color: var(--primary-text);
  border-top: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-left: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-right: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-bottom: none;
}

.acc-tabs .label .label-name {
   display: inline-block;
}

.acc-tabs .label .label-name:after {
    content: "";
    border-bottom: 2px solid var(--primary-medium);
    display: block;
    margin-top: 6px;
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label .label-name:after {
    content: "\2304";
    border-bottom: none;
    margin-top:-10px;
    color:var(--primary-medium);
}
/** these next three are required to overwrite existing label css **/
.acc-tabs input[type=radio] {
        display: block;
    }

    border:none;
}

  display: none;
  padding: 20px 30px 30px;

  border-left: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);

}

<main class="main-content">
	<div class="tmpl-post-single single-post">
			<section data-block-index="1" class="bg-teal block-container block-columns block-index-1" aria-label="Columns">
			<div class="block-inner num-col-1 ">
		<div class="row align-center">
							<div class="columns small-12 medium-12 large-12 col-content wysiwyg">
					<h1>A new day at 98point6: evolution from virtual care to SaaS provider</h1>
<div style="padding-top: 1em; display: flex; align-items: baseline;">
<div><strong>Authored by:</strong></div>
<div style="padding-left: 1em;"><a class="link-text subtitle" href="/about-us/#leadership">Jay Burrell</a>, President & CEO</div>
</div>
				</div>
						</div>
	</div>
		</section>
		<section data-block-index="2" class="padding-small block-bg-none block-container block-columns block-index-2" aria-label="Columns">
			<div class="block-inner num-col-1 ">
		<div class="row align-center">
							<div class="columns small-12 medium-12 large-12 col-content wysiwyg">
					<p class="overhead-line">On the heels of relaunching as 98point6 Technologies following the <a class="link-text" href="/press_release/98point6-press-release_03062023/">divestiture of our Care Delivery Division</a> by Transcarent last month, I wanted to take the opportunity to address the many questions I have received as to why we made the shift from virtual care provider to SaaS company partnering with the most recognized healthcare brands. Since 98point6 was founded in 2015, our mission has always been focused on creating a technology-driven, on-demand platform crafted by physicians for physicians. We worked to successfully identify and close severe gaps in the virtual care space, and grew aggressively by building an incredibly talented team, investing in product innovation and working hand-in-hand with our customers to make primary care more accessible and affordable. Prior to and during the pandemic, many of the largest employers in the country like Boeing and Chipotle relied on 98point6 to offer their employees a premium virtual care experience.</p>
<p>Today, we see a similar trajectory of unmet need among healthcare institutions looking for solutions to enable premium digital care experiences for their patients.</p>
<p>Since the onset of the pandemic, health systems have been working hard to adjust backend processes so they can meet rising patient demand for hybrid care delivery models. When asked, only 13% of health systems consider themselves ahead of the pace of change consumers expect with regards to digital capabilities. At the same time, tech and healthcare heavyweights have made significant investments in this area, adding more financial and competitive pressures to the market.</p>
<p>Our evolution to 98point6 Technologies comes at a time when every healthcare provider is on an urgent mission to compete in an increasingly crowded and undifferentiated marketplace. Our job now is to take what we’ve learned as 98point6, and offer them a time-tested, clinician-approved virtual care platform that meets the needs of both patients and providers. The 98point6 Technology Platform has been shaped by best practices developed over years of operating a standalone clinic staffed by providers on the virtual care front lines. The interest for this offering has been robust, and we are already implementing licensing deals with a number of healthcare organizations like MultiCare Health System’s Indigo Health and others that we look forward to announcing soon.</p>
<p>To scale our software business even further for current and future partners, we just closed a $30+ million financing round that will enable us to continue developing innovations for the platform, like data modeling and AI. Features like these will strengthen the value healthcare providers are delivering to patients and help them keep up against emerging competitors.</p>
<p>As we look at the most pressing challenges in the healthcare industry today, we see a huge opportunity in the market for purpose-built solutions, built for and by providers. With ample opportunity for innovation as we enter our next phase of growth as 98point6 Technologies, I believe we’re poised to meet that opportunity in a way no other company can. We have a significant lead in the market that cannot be easily replicated, and we look forward to continuing the momentum and providing more updates in the weeks and months ahead.</p>
				</div>
						</div>
	</div>
		</section>

# [A new day at 98point6: evolution from virtual care to SaaS provider by Alexis Frank on 2023-04-22](https://www.98point6.com/a-new-day-at-98point6-evolution-from-virtual-care-to-saas-provider/)
On the heels of relaunching as 98point6 Technologies following the divestiture of our Care Delivery Division by Transcarent last month, I wanted to take the opportunity to address the many questions I have received as to why we made the shift from virtual care provider to SaaS company partnering with the most recognized healthcare brands. Since 98point6 was founded in 2015, our mission has always been focused on creating a technology-driven, on-demand platform crafted by physicians for physicians. We worked to successfully identify and close severe gaps in the virtual care space, and grew aggressively by building an incredibly talented team, investing in product innovation and working hand-in-hand with our customers to make primary care more accessible and affordable. Prior to and during the pandemic, many of the largest employers in the country like Boeing and Chipotle relied on 98point6 to offer their employees a premium virtual care experience.

Today, we see a similar trajectory of unmet need among healthcare institutions looking for solutions to enable premium digital care experiences for their patients.

Since the onset of the pandemic, health systems have been working hard to adjust backend processes so they can meet rising patient demand for hybrid care delivery models. When asked, only 13% of health systems consider themselves ahead of the pace of change consumers expect with regards to digital capabilities. At the same time, tech and healthcare heavyweights have made significant investments in this area, adding more financial and competitive pressures to the market.

Our evolution to 98point6 Technologies comes at a time when every healthcare provider is on an urgent mission to compete in an increasingly crowded and undifferentiated marketplace. Our job now is to take what we’ve learned as 98point6, and offer them a time-tested, clinician-approved virtual care platform that meets the needs of both patients and providers. The 98point6 Technology Platform has been shaped by best practices developed over years of operating a standalone clinic staffed by providers on the virtual care front lines. The interest for this offering has been robust, and we are already implementing licensing deals with a number of healthcare organizations like MultiCare Health System’s Indigo Health and others that we look forward to announcing soon.

To scale our software business even further for current and future partners, we just closed a $30+ million financing round that will enable us to continue developing innovations for the platform, like data modeling and AI. Features like these will strengthen the value healthcare providers are delivering to patients and help them keep up against emerging competitors.

As we look at the most pressing challenges in the healthcare industry today, we see a huge opportunity in the market for purpose-built solutions, built for and by providers. With ample opportunity for innovation as we enter our next phase of growth as 98point6 Technologies, I believe we’re poised to meet that opportunity in a way no other company can. We have a significant lead in the market that cannot be easily replicated, and we look forward to continuing the momentum and providing more updates in the weeks and months ahead.

<style>
   .acc-tabs * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.acc-tabs *:focus, .acc-tabs input:focus + label {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px #017681;
}

.acc-tabs {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin: 0 auto 20px;
  border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0;
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab {
  position: absolute;
  opacity: 0;
}

.acc-tabs .label {
  padding: 10px 8px;
  background: var(--primary-beige);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: 'Lora', serif;
line-height: 12px; font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--primary-text);
  transition: background .3s, color .3s;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 0;
  text-align: center;
  width: auto;
    flex-grow: 1;
    border-radius: 0;
    border-bottom: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
    margin-bottom:0;
}

.acc-tabs .label:hover {
  background: var(--neutral-light);
}

.acc-tabs .label:active {
  background: var(--neutral-light);  
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label {
  background: var(--neutral-light);
  color: var(--primary-text);
  border-top: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-left: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-right: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-bottom: none;
}

.acc-tabs .label .label-name {
   display: inline-block;
}

.acc-tabs .label .label-name:after {
    content: "";
    border-bottom: 2px solid var(--primary-medium);
    display: block;
    margin-top: 6px;
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label .label-name:after {
    content: "\2304";
    border-bottom: none;
    margin-top:-10px;
    color:var(--primary-medium);
}
/** these next three are required to overwrite existing label css **/
.acc-tabs input[type=radio] {
        display: block;
    }
.acc-tabs input[type=radio]+label::before {
    border:none;
}
.acc-tabs input[type=radio]+label::after, .acc-tabs input[type=radio]:checked+label::after {background:transparent;}

    .acc-tabs .panel {
    order: 99;
  }
.acc-tabs .panel {
  display: none;
  padding: 20px 30px 30px;
  background: var(--neutral-light);
  width: 100%;
  border-left: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-bottom: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-right: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
}
.acc-tabs .panel.padding-none {
    padding: 0;
}
.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label + .panel {
  display: block;
}
.mt-fullwidth-row {
    display: grid;
    background-color: transparent;
}
.mt-fullwidth-row.left-image {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
}

.mt-text {
    padding: 6% 7.68%;
}

.mt-image {
    background-position: center center;
    background-size: cover;
    min-height: 250px;
}

@media (min-width: 40.0625em) {
.mt-fullwidth-row.left-image {grid-template-columns: 33% 64%;}

<main class="main-content">
	<div class="tmpl-post-single single-post">
			<section data-block-index="1" class="bg-teal block-container block-columns block-index-1" aria-label="Columns">
			<div class="block-inner num-col-1 ">
		<div class="row align-center">
							<div class="columns small-12 medium-12 large-12 col-content wysiwyg">
					<h1>98point6 Technologies Wins 2024 MedTech Breakthrough Award for Best Overall Telehealth Solution</h1>
				</div>
						</div>
	</div>
		</section>
		<section data-block-index="2" class="block-bg-none block-container block-columns block-index-2" aria-label="Columns">
			<div class="block-inner num-col-1 ">
		<div class="row align-center">
							<div class="columns small-12 medium-12 large-12 col-content wysiwyg">
					<p><img decoding="async" src="https://staging-marketing-uploads-gravitate-98point6-com.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/uploads/2024/05/08234129/MedTech_Breakthrough_Awards-Logo-outlined-300x275-1-150x150.webp" alt="" width="150" height="150" class="alignleft size-thumbnail wp-image-33465" />We’re thrilled to announce that 98point6 Technologies has won a 2024 MedTech Breakthrough Award for Best Overall Telehealth Solution!</p>
<p>While consumers increasingly prefer hybrid care experiences post-pandemic, virtual care adoption remains a challenge as health systems struggle under financial, competitive, and regulatory pressures. Meanwhile, clinician burnout has reached all-time highs, with more and more providers leaving the profession for good. Amid this rapidly evolving market, we’re humbled to know that <a class="link-text" href="/platform/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">the 98point6 Virtual Care Platform</a> – our AI-powered, purpose-built, integrated platform for frictionless care delivery – was recognized for its ability to help healthcare organizations create, grow, and future-proof their virtual care offerings.</p>
<p>The mission of <a class="link-text" href="https://medtechbreakthrough.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">the MedTech Breakthrough Awards</a> is to recognize the innovation and success of health and medical companies, technologies, and solutions, with this year’s program an extensive and competitive evaluation process of nearly 4,500 nominations from all over the globe. And 98point6 is in good company; winners from other categories for 2024 include Abbott, Talkspace, GoodRx, Medtronic, Google Health Connect, and many more.</p>
<p>“We are honored to receive this award from MedTech Breakthrough, as it reaffirms our commitment to revolutionizing healthcare delivery through innovative telehealth solutions,” said Jay Burrell, CEO, 98point6 Technologies. “This recognition is a testament to the hard work and dedication of our team, who continually strive to empower healthcare organizations with the tools they need to deliver exceptional care, improve patient outcomes, and navigate the complexities of modern healthcare.”</p>
<p>Harnessing the power of AI along with evidence-based, automated clinical practice standards and EHR integration, the 98point6 Platform is a scalable, cloud-based virtual care solution that enables healthcare providers to conduct efficient, high-quality patient visits asynchronously or in real-time – without the administrative burden. Our comprehensive solution is helping leading health systems across the country enhance patient access, improve outcomes, and foster satisfaction and loyalty.</p>
<p>This MedTech Breakthrough Award win comes on the heels of our latest product innovation: the 98point6 asynchronous care solution unlocks new levels of efficiency, meets more consumers where they are, and enables expanded communication and care delivery use cases – not only for hundreds of low-acuity conditions, but medication adherence, chronic care management, and more. As part of this announcement, we acquired the remaining assets of Bright.md – a leader in asynchronous telehealth and former MedTech Breakthrough Award Winner.</p>
<p>By empowering providers with more flexibility to support multiple modes of hybrid care and communication based on patient preferences, 98point6 is helping to mitigate clinician burnout, enhance the patient experience, and improve continuity of care, all in one integrated solution.</p>
<p><a class="link-text" href="/campaign/schedule-demo/">Learn more about how the MedTech Breakthrough Best Overall Telehealth Solution can drive your strategic objectives here. </a></p>
<p>For the full list of MedTech Breakthrough Award winners, visit: <a class="link-text" href="https://medtechbreakthrough.com/2024-winners/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://medtechbreakthrough.com/2024-winners/</a>.</p>

# [98point6 Technologies Wins 2024 MedTech Breakthrough Award for Best Overall Telehealth Solution by joe.panzetta on 2024-05-08](https://www.98point6.com/98point6-technologies-wins-2024-medtech-breakthrough-award-for-best-overall-telehealth-solution/)
While consumers increasingly prefer hybrid care experiences post-pandemic, virtual care adoption remains a challenge as health systems struggle under financial, competitive, and regulatory pressures. Meanwhile, clinician burnout has reached all-time highs, with more and more providers leaving the profession for good. Amid this rapidly evolving market, we’re humbled to know that the 98point6 Virtual Care Platform – our AI-powered, purpose-built, integrated platform for frictionless care delivery – was recognized for its ability to help healthcare organizations create, grow, and future-proof their virtual care offerings.

The mission of the MedTech Breakthrough Awards is to recognize the innovation and success of health and medical companies, technologies, and solutions, with this year’s program an extensive and competitive evaluation process of nearly 4,500 nominations from all over the globe. And 98point6 is in good company; winners from other categories for 2024 include Abbott, Talkspace, GoodRx, Medtronic, Google Health Connect, and many more.

“We are honored to receive this award from MedTech Breakthrough, as it reaffirms our commitment to revolutionizing healthcare delivery through innovative telehealth solutions,” said Jay Burrell, CEO, 98point6 Technologies. “This recognition is a testament to the hard work and dedication of our team, who continually strive to empower healthcare organizations with the tools they need to deliver exceptional care, improve patient outcomes, and navigate the complexities of modern healthcare.”

Harnessing the power of AI along with evidence-based, automated clinical practice standards and EHR integration, the 98point6 Platform is a scalable, cloud-based virtual care solution that enables healthcare providers to conduct efficient, high-quality patient visits asynchronously or in real-time – without the administrative burden. Our comprehensive solution is helping leading health systems across the country enhance patient access, improve outcomes, and foster satisfaction and loyalty.

This MedTech Breakthrough Award win comes on the heels of our latest product innovation: the 98point6 asynchronous care solution unlocks new levels of efficiency, meets more consumers where they are, and enables expanded communication and care delivery use cases – not only for hundreds of low-acuity conditions, but medication adherence, chronic care management, and more. As part of this announcement, we acquired the remaining assets of Bright.md – a leader in asynchronous telehealth and former MedTech Breakthrough Award Winner.

By empowering providers with more flexibility to support multiple modes of hybrid care and communication based on patient preferences, 98point6 is helping to mitigate clinician burnout, enhance the patient experience, and improve continuity of care, all in one integrated solution.

Learn more about how the MedTech Breakthrough Best Overall Telehealth Solution can drive your strategic objectives here.

<style>
   .acc-tabs * {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.acc-tabs *:focus, .acc-tabs input:focus + label {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px #017681;
}

.acc-tabs {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin: 0 auto 20px;
  border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0;
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab {
  position: absolute;
  opacity: 0;
}

.acc-tabs .label {
  padding: 10px 8px;
  background: var(--primary-beige);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: 'Lora', serif;
line-height: 12px; font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--primary-text);
  transition: background .3s, color .3s;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 0;
  text-align: center;
  width: auto;
    flex-grow: 1;
    border-radius: 0;
    border-bottom: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
    margin-bottom:0;
}

.acc-tabs .label:hover {
  background: var(--neutral-light);
}

.acc-tabs .label:active {
  background: var(--neutral-light);  
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label {
  background: var(--neutral-light);
  color: var(--primary-text);
  border-top: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-left: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-right: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-bottom: none;
}

.acc-tabs .label .label-name {
   display: inline-block;
}

.acc-tabs .label .label-name:after {
    content: "";
    border-bottom: 2px solid var(--primary-medium);
    display: block;
    margin-top: 6px;
}

.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label .label-name:after {
    content: "\2304";
    border-bottom: none;
    margin-top:-10px;
    color:var(--primary-medium);
}
/** these next three are required to overwrite existing label css **/
.acc-tabs input[type=radio] {
        display: block;
    }
.acc-tabs input[type=radio]+label::before {
    border:none;
}
.acc-tabs input[type=radio]+label::after, .acc-tabs input[type=radio]:checked+label::after {background:transparent;}

    .acc-tabs .panel {
    order: 99;
  }
.acc-tabs .panel {
  display: none;
  padding: 20px 30px 30px;
  background: var(--neutral-light);
  width: 100%;
  border-left: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-bottom: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
  border-right: solid 1px var(--primary-gray);
}
.acc-tabs .panel.padding-none {
    padding: 0;
}
.acc-tabs .radiotab:checked + .label + .panel {
  display: block;
}
.mt-fullwidth-row {
    display: grid;
    background-color: transparent;
}
.mt-fullwidth-row.left-image {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
}

.mt-text {
    padding: 6% 7.68%;
}

.mt-image {
    background-position: center center;
    background-size: cover;
    min-height: 250px;
}

.mt-fullwidth-row.left-image {grid-template-columns: 33% 64%;}
